title: Enhancing Leadership Practical Competencies: Interactive Videodisc-Based Mathematics Curriculum Design

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can verify content effectiveness by conducting at least three formative assessments during the interactive video disc development process (design-production-editing-programming).
Learners can produce and integrate five or more types of visual materials for mathematical concepts using editing tools.
Learners can develop prototypes that improve interactive learning activities at least twice by incorporating peer feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
